abstract: Leonard Green & Partners said Wednesday it had closed its latest private equity fund, Green Equity Investors V LP, at $5.3 billion, nearly three times the size of its previous buyout fund, which closed four years ago.
lead_paragraph: Leonard Green & Partners said Wednesday it had closed its latest private equity fund, Green Equity Investors V LP, at $5.3 billion, nearly three times the size of its previous buyout fund, which closed four years ago.

headline.main: Leonard Green Raises $5.3 Billion for Buyouts
